channel.title: Abouts on rmrfslashbin
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on rmrfslashbin

item.description: Hi, I’m Robert! I’m a Lifelong Technologist My first computer was a Tandy TRS-80 CoCo 2 and I lived for every issue of Rainbow Magazine . I taught myself various programming languages: BASIC, assembly, C, C++, Pascal, Java, Javascript, Python, and Go. In my early teenage years, I acquired my first PC running MS-DOS . Eventually, I found Red Hat Linux 5.1 , paved over Windows , and never looked back!
